companyInfo.name: AppFolio
companyInfo.industry: Real estate technology / Property management software

implementation.useCase: AI-assisted responses and task automation for property management communications through Realm-X, an embedded generative AI solution within AppFolio's platform. The system helps property managers respond to resident communications more efficiently while maintaining professional service.
implementation.problem: Property managers spend up to half their workday on communications with residents, owners, and vendors. They need to maintain detailed records, understand complex residential histories, make quick decisions about maintenance dispatch, and ensure clear professional communication while scaling their response capabilities.

metrics.metric: increase in adoption rates due to Claude 3 Haiku's faster response times
metrics.sourceText: When Haiku came out, that actually was a big time saving, paired with some changes on our infrastructure, we really made a big revamp in the experience particularly when it comes to latency. We almost tripled our adoption

metrics.metric: weekly time savings on communications for property managers
metrics.sourceText: Beta customers (property managers) report saving about 11 hours per week on communications alone

metrics.metric: average time saved per message while ensuring appropriate tone and context
metrics.sourceText: the system saving an average of 26 seconds per message while ensuring appropriate tone and context
Process over half a million AI-suggested responses

qualitativeBenefits.benefit: Improved writing quality and professional communication
qualitativeBenefits.detail: Helps property managers navigate challenging situations and maintain composure when answering repetitive questions
qualitativeBenefits.sourceText: Not everyone's a great writer. Users say this actually helps them navigate challenging situations, especially when answering the same question for the twentieth time in a day and need to maintain composure.

qualitativeBenefits.detail: Property managers use reclaimed time for higher-value activities or improved work-life balance
qualitativeBenefits.sourceText: We've seen the full range of benefits. From teams getting more important tasks done to employees having better work-life balance.

qualitativeBenefits.benefit: Higher acceptance rate with more advanced model
qualitativeBenefits.detail: Claude 3.5 Sonnet's ability to process nuanced context leads to higher acceptance rates
qualitativeBenefits.sourceText: We're seeing a much higher acceptance rate with Sonnet because the model can be more informed and make more intelligent responses.

technicalDetails.architecture: AppFolio uses a platform-first strategy with centralized functions like ML ops, security, and data governance. They implement Claude through Amazon Bedrock, which allows them to test new models quickly while maintaining enterprise-grade security and compliance.
technicalDetails.promptEngineering: Not mentioned specifically, but the case study indicates that Claude models are used differently based on complexity: Haiku for high-volume, rapid-response scenarios and Sonnet for complex communications requiring more context.
technicalDetails.challenges: Early in their gen AI journey, AppFolio saw adoption drop off due to slow response times with their initial solution.
technicalDetails.solutions: They switched to Claude 3 Haiku for faster response times and made infrastructure changes to improve latency, which led to tripled adoption rates. They also use Claude 3.5 Sonnet for more complex communications requiring nuanced context.
technicalDetails.scale: Processing over half a million AI-suggested responses for property managers serving over eight million residents.
